query: UPDATE system_state SET genesis_hash = COALESCE(?1, genesis_hash), last_order_id = COALESCE(?2, last_order_id), last_order_hash = COALESCE(?3, last_order_hash), synced_up_to_id = COALESCE(?4, synced_up_to_id), synced_up_to_hash = COALESCE(?5, synced_up_to_hash), last_sync_time = COALESCE(?6, last_sync_time), order_count = COALESCE(?7, order_count), updated_at = ?8 WHERE id = ?9
